articles.title: Ace Frehley, hard-rocking Kiss guitarist, dies at 74 - The Washington Post
articles.description: Taking the blues rock of his favorite bands, Mr. Frehley imbued the group with energy and leaned into theatrics as a performer.
articles.content:
Ace Frehley, the galvanizing guitarist who helped make Kiss one of the biggest rock groups of the 1970s and 80s, died Oct. 16 in Morristown, New Jersey. He was 74.
